L2_gloss: (chiefly Northern) only, but, however, Synonyms: فقط‎

oar, paddle, scull
avari kəşe ― to row, to scull

lightning
Mı avəvü çəkiyəde vindıme. ― I saw the lightning flash.

to be
Ha manqədə az se rüj danq bedəm.Every month I go crazy for three days.(literally, “become crazy”)
Dı mı ğum bedəş ya ne?Will you become my relative or not?
Ço damə bedəniş?Why aren't you talking?
A woman who guides the bride on her wedding night.
croup (top of the rump of a horse)
The first letter of the Talysh alphabet, written in the Cyrillic script.
attack, ‏تجه برده‎ ― taja bardē ― to attack
very, ‏ور چاک‎ ― ver čâk ― very good, very nice
very, ‏ور چاک‎ ― ver čâk ― very good, very nice
